name: Python Tools for Visual Studio
tagline: Free, open source plugin that turns Visual Studio into a Python IDE
body:
### Welcome

We're still getting settled into our new home at [github](https://github.com/Microsoft/PTVS).

For now, all of our downloads and documentation can still be found at [our old home](https://pytools.codeplex.com), but you should report problems [here](https://github.com/Microsoft/PTVS/issues).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
